description:
The game between Kirino and Washinomori is officially starting. Washinomori hits the first ball. It`s a good start to Kurokan`s tactic.
Top half of the first inning, Washinomori gains the first score with a squeeze tactic.
Bottom half of the first inning, Sakamoto accurately passes the ball from the outfield and a Kirino player is tagged before the home plate. 
The first inning is over. Washinomori has shocked the audience. They are currently ahead by one score.
Source: crunchyroll
